summary: Mod adds to the game nice crowns with animated parts and some FX.
descriptionHtml:
[color=lightblue][b]Name:		Unique Animated Crown[/b][/color]
Date:		2013/05/31
version:	1.00
Author:		Anton


[heading][color=yellow][b]Description:[/b][/color][/heading]
I proud to introduce to community new stuff i made. :)
This is unique \"hand\'s made\" crowns (gold/silver and attacheble crown light) with animated elements and some FX.

[heading][color=yellow][b]Main features:[/b][/color][/heading]
- Own animation
- Sound effects
- Dynamic textures
- Dynamic glowing
- Sparkles effects
- Lighting effects
- Distortion effects
- Smoke effects
- Unique mesh

Short video demonstration:
[youtube]fsrJqZS3dSQ[/youtube]


[heading][color=yellow][b]How to get it:[/b][/color][/heading]
Only true master in smithing and enchanting can forge it in Skyforge. (and BTW it must be a woman :) )
(in \"Miscellaneous\" section)

Or just use console commands:
==> to get crown\'s ID: 
help \"Unique Golden Crown\"
help \"Unique Silver Crown\"
help \"Unique Crown Light\"
==> to get crowns to inventory (where \"XXxxxxxx\" is founded ID, for example \"73001D8A\"):
player.additem XXxxxxxx 1


[heading][color=yellow][b]Install:[/b][/color][/heading]
Unpack all data to \"\\Data\" folder or just use NNM.
Check in launcher \"Unique Animated Crown.esp\"

[heading][color=yellow][b]Uninstall:[/b][/color][/heading]
Delete folders: 
- \"data\\meshes\\[Anton] mods\\Unique crown\"
- \"data\\scripts\\_Anton_UniqueCrown_Light.pex\"
- \"data\\textures\\[Anton] mods\\Unique crown\" 
and file \"Unique Animated Crown.esp\"

[heading][color=yellow][b]Issues:[/b][/color][/heading]
- Once have got, crown must be with its master or otherwise it will disappear. (just don\'t drop it from inventory :) )
- Don\'t shoot from a bow when the crown is equipped or you will loose it.
- companions is shying to wear it.

[heading][color=yellow][b]Credits:[/b][/color][/heading]
Blender 2.65
Paint.NET
NifTools team
Site \"render911.ru\" for free textures
Bethesda for the Game and CK
Me, and my tools for the rest :)

[heading][color=yellow][b]Permissions:[/b][/color][/heading]
Have a fun but don\'t change/reupload anything without my permission please.
author: Anton

files.name: Unique Animated Crown for NNM - for big Hairs
